sentence.Network_en: Thick black smoke billowed over the well - preserved ruins of Olympia, on the Peloponnese.
sentence.Network_cn: 浓重的黑烟向保存完好的伯罗奔尼撒半岛的奥林匹亚遗迹奔去.

sentence.Network_en: Mycenae, located northeast of Peloponnese, is a small village that effuses amorous feelings of Mediterranean Sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 位于伯罗奔尼撒半岛东北部的迈锡尼, 是一个洋溢着地中海风情的小村.
